Detailed Description

This interface describes a class that generates the vertex and texture data for an ecotype.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual EcotypeGenerator::~EcotypeGenerator (  )  [inline, virtual]

Member Function Documentation

EcotypeGenerator * EcotypeGenerator::create ( DataSectionPtr  pSection,
Ecotype &  target 
) [static]

This method creates and initialises an EcotypeGenerator given a data section.

The legacy xml grammar of a list of <visual> sections is maintained; also the new grammar of a <generator> section is introduced, using the g_creatorFns factory map.

Parameters:
pSection Section containing generator data.
target Ecotype to store the texture resource used by the generator, or empty string ("").
